content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0))

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0))

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts iron gear wheels

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into a full inventory
- Ensure the target entity has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. Check the inventory capacity and current items.

### Errors when extracting from an empty or insufficient inventory
- Verify that the target entity has enough items to extract before attempting to extract. If the inventory is empty or below the required amount, wait until more items are available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check if the tile is occupied by another entity.
